div.div:
After the gruesome murder of two small-town residents, a ramen shop owner, and a local student, the community is left shocked. Mizuki Aikawa, the best friend of one of the victims, confesses to the brutal crime. However, nothing is as it seems, and Mizuki's public defenders believe there has to be more to the story. When the truth unravels, they discover a tale of class, exploitation, and the deeper struggles of meeting family expectations.
(Source: Dark Horse)

After painstaking effort, fashion model Ars has achieved immense popularity. However, a genius named Meiko appears next to her.
Her overwhelming natural talent captures the world's attention. She doesn't want to lose. Ars is eager to compete, but Meiko's body has a certain problem...
Aiming for the top, she walks down the shining runway. To grasp glory. To leave proof that she lived. The girls' fiery radiance pierces their hearts, hot and cold!
